items.value: At the beginning of time, the fish society performed chtonic rituals to get likes, but they didn't count on what would happen.
Cthulhu arrived and brought chaos with him, bringing destruction to the fish society, but some offerings changed the course of history.
Cthulhu turned out to worship the traditional and cultural food of the fish society, reducing the number of sacrifices to only one per year.
The fish society decided to carry out sacrifices on the basis of dueling bubbles, so that only the most capable survive and contribute the most to society.
The new champions for the duel of who will be sacrificed to Cthulhu have been decided between you and your best friend!
